disableBackground.name: Disable Moving Background
disableBackground.description: Disable moving background in **all Rated Layouts Layer and Pages**. <cy>Enable this setting if you experience performance issues.</cy>

backgroundType.name: Background Type
backgroundType.description: Change the custom moving background in the Rated Layouts page. <cy>Numbers are based off the order shown in the background selection in editor.</cy>

floorType.name: Ground Type
floorType.description: Change the custom moving background ground in the Rated Layouts page. <cy>Numbers are based off the order shown in the ground selection in editor.</cy>

rgbBackground.name: Background Color
rgbBackground.description: Customize the background color of the **Main Page**, **Custom Search**, and **Leaderboard**

rgbFloor.name: Floor Color
rgbFloor.description: Customize the floor color of the **Main Page**, **Custom Search**, and **Leaderboard**

disableRewardAnimation.name: Disable Reward Animation
disableRewardAnimation.description: Disable the reward animation when you complete a rated layout level <cy>Enable this if you kept crashing from the reward animation</cy>

disableCommentGlow.name: Disable Comment Glow
disableCommentGlow.description: Disables the blue glow effect on comments made by users using <cl>Rated Layouts mod</cl>

disableCreatorPoints.name: Disable Creator Points
disableCreatorPoints.description: Disable all related to Creator Points. <co>This is those who doesn't want to see creator points entirely as they see it as a competition.</c> <cr>Although this won't entirely remove it, it just gives a sense that it is.</c>

compatibilityMode.name: Disable Fetch Requests
compatibilityMode.description: Disables all <cy>/fetch</cy> requests to get level rating data and level comments. <cf>This is useful for mod developers that is having issues with the web request being clogged up... sorry andy</c>. <co>Ratings will not be shown on the Level cell unless you open the level on the Level Info Layer or have cached the ratings already or if the comment has been fetched.</co>
